text.ascii: zaunaka uvAca
text.ur: śaunaka uvāca

text.ascii: purANam akhilaM tAta pitA te 'dhItavAn purA
text.ur: purāṇam akhilaṁ tāta pitā te ’dhītavān purā

text.ascii: kaccit tvam api tat sarvam adhISe lomaharSaNe
text.ur: kaccit tvam api tat sarvam adhīṣe lomaharṣaṇe

text.ascii: purANe hi kathA divyA AdivaMzAz ca dhImatAm
text.ud: पुराणे हि कथा दिव्या आदिवंशाश्च धीमताम्
text.ur: purāṇe hi kathā divyā ādivaṁśāś ca dhīmatām

text.ascii: kathyante tAH purAsmAbhiH zrutAH pUrvaM pitus tava
text.ud: कथ्यन्ते ताः पुरास्माभिः श्रुताः पूर्वं पितुस्तव
text.ur: kathyante tāḥ purāsmābhiḥ śrutāḥ pūrvaṁ pitus tava

text.ascii: tatra vaMzam ahaM pUrvaM zrotum icchAmi bhArgavam
text.ur: tatra vaṁśam ahaṁ pūrvaṁ śrotum icchāmi bhārgavam

text.ascii: kathayasva kathAm etAM kalyAH sma zravaNe tava
text.ud: कथयस्व कथामेतां कल्याः स्म श्रवणे तव
text.ur: kathayasva kathām etāṁ kalyāḥ sma śravaṇe tava

text.ascii: sUta uvAca
text.ur: sūta uvāca

text.ascii: yad adhItaM purA samyag dvijazreSTha mahAtmabhiH
text.ur: yad adhītaṁ purā samyag dvijaśreṣṭha mahātmabhiḥ

text.ascii: vaizaMpAyanaviprAdyais taiz cApi kathitaM purA
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyanaviprādyais taiś cāpi kathitaṁ purā

text.ascii: yad adhItaM ca pitrA me samyak caiva tato mayA
text.ud: यदधीतं च पित्रा मे सम्यक्चैव ततो मया
text.ur: yad adhītaṁ ca pitrā me samyak caiva tato mayā

text.ascii: tat tAvac chRNu yo devaiH sendraiH sAgnimarudgaNaiH
text.ur: tat tāvac chr̥ṇu yo devaiḥ sendraiḥ sāgnimarudgaṇaiḥ

text.ascii: pUjitaH pravaro vaMzo bhRgUNAM bhRgunandana
text.ur: pūjitaḥ pravaro vaṁśo bhr̥gūṇāṁ bhr̥gunandana

text.ascii: imaM vaMzam ahaM brahman bhArgavaM te mahAmune
text.ur: imaṁ vaṁśam ahaṁ brahman bhārgavaṁ te mahāmune

text.ascii: nigadAmi kathAyuktaM purANAzrayasaMyutam
text.ur: nigadāmi kathāyuktaṁ purāṇāśrayasaṁyutam

text.ascii: bhRgoH sudayitaH putraz cyavano nAma bhArgavaH
text.ur: bhr̥goḥ sudayitaḥ putraś cyavano nāma bhārgavaḥ

text.ascii: cyavanasyApi dAyAdaH pramatir nAma dhArmikaH
text.ur: cyavanasyāpi dāyādaḥ pramatir nāma dhārmikaḥ

text.ascii: pramater apy abhUt putro ghRtAcyAM rurur ity uta
text.ur: pramater apy abhūt putro ghr̥tācyāṁ rurur ity uta

text.ascii: ruror api suto jajJe zunako vedapAragaH
text.ur: ruror api suto jajñe śunako vedapāragaḥ

text.ascii: pramadvarAyAM dharmAtmA tava pUrvapitAmahAt
text.ur: pramadvarāyāṁ dharmātmā tava pūrvapitāmahāt

text.ascii: tapasvI ca yazasvI ca zrutavAn brahmavittamaH
text.ur: tapasvī ca yaśasvī ca śrutavān brahmavittamaḥ

text.ascii: dharmiSThaH satyavAdI ca niyato niyatendriyaH
text.ur: dharmiṣṭhaḥ satyavādī ca niyato niyatendriyaḥ

text.ascii: zaunaka uvAca
text.ur: śaunaka uvāca

text.ascii: sUtaputra yathA tasya bhArgavasya mahAtmanaH
text.ur: sūtaputra yathā tasya bhārgavasya mahātmanaḥ

text.ascii: cyavanatvaM parikhyAtaM tan mamAcakSva pRcchataH
text.ur: cyavanatvaṁ parikhyātaṁ tan mamācakṣva pr̥cchataḥ

text.ascii: sUta uvAca
text.ur: sūta uvāca

text.ascii: bhRgoH sudayitA bhAryA pulomety abhivizrutA
text.ur: bhr̥goḥ sudayitā bhāryā pulomety abhiviśrutā

text.ascii: tasyAM garbhaH samabhavad bhRgor vIryasamudbhavaH
text.ur: tasyāṁ garbhaḥ samabhavad bhr̥gor vīryasamudbhavaḥ

text.ascii: tasmin garbhe saMbhRte 'tha pulomAyAM bhRgUdvaha
text.ur: tasmin garbhe saṁbhr̥te ’tha pulomāyāṁ bhr̥gūdvaha

text.ascii: samaye samazIlinyAM dharmapatnyAM yazasvinaH
text.ur: samaye samaśīlinyāṁ dharmapatnyāṁ yaśasvinaḥ

text.ascii: abhiSekAya niSkrAnte bhRgau dharmabhRtAM vare
text.ur: abhiṣekāya niṣkrānte bhr̥gau dharmabhr̥tāṁ vare

text.ascii: AzramaM tasya rakSo 'tha pulomAbhyAjagAma ha
text.ur: āśramaṁ tasya rakṣo ’tha pulomābhyājagāma ha

text.ascii: taM pravizyAzramaM dRSTvA bhRgor bhAryAm aninditAm
text.ur: taṁ praviśyāśramaṁ dr̥ṣṭvā bhr̥gor bhāryām aninditām

text.ascii: hRcchayena samAviSTo vicetAH samapadyata
text.ur: hr̥cchayena samāviṣṭo vicetāḥ samapadyata

text.ascii: abhyAgataM tu tad rakSaH pulomA cArudarzanA
text.ur: abhyāgataṁ tu tad rakṣaḥ pulomā cārudarśanā

text.ascii: nyamantrayata vanyena phalamUlAdinA tadA
text.ur: nyamantrayata vanyena phalamūlādinā tadā

text.ascii: tAM tu rakSas tato brahman hRcchayenAbhipIDitam
text.ur: tāṁ tu rakṣas tato brahman hr̥cchayenābhipīḍitam

text.ascii: dRSTvA hRSTam abhUt tatra jihIrSus tAm aninditAm
text.ur: dr̥ṣṭvā hr̥ṣṭam abhūt tatra jihīrṣus tām aninditām

text.ascii: athAgnizaraNe 'pazyaj jvalitaM jAtavedasam
text.ur: athāgniśaraṇe ’paśyaj jvalitaṁ jātavedasam

text.ascii: tam apRcchat tato rakSaH pAvakaM jvalitaM tadA
text.ur: tam apr̥cchat tato rakṣaḥ pāvakaṁ jvalitaṁ tadā

text.ascii: zaMsa me kasya bhAryeyam agne pRSTa Rtena vai
text.ud: शंस मे कस्य भार्येयमग्ने पृष्ट ऋतेन वै
text.ur: śaṁsa me kasya bhāryeyam agne pr̥ṣṭa r̥tena vai

text.ascii: satyas tvam asi satyaM me vada pAvaka pRcchate
text.ud: सत्यस्त्वमसि सत्यं मे वद पावक पृच्छते
text.ur: satyas tvam asi satyaṁ me vada pāvaka pr̥cchate

text.ascii: mayA hIyaM pUrvavRtA bhAryArthe varavarNinI
text.ur: mayā hīyaṁ pūrvavr̥tā bhāryārthe varavarṇinī

text.ascii: pazcAt tv imAM pitA prAdAd bhRgave 'nRtakAriNe
text.ur: paścāt tv imāṁ pitā prādād bhr̥gave ’nr̥takāriṇe

text.ascii: seyaM yadi varArohA bhRgor bhAryA rahogatA
text.ur: seyaṁ yadi varārohā bhr̥gor bhāryā rahogatā

text.ascii: tathA satyaM samAkhyAhi jihIrSAmy AzramAd imAm
text.ur: tathā satyaṁ samākhyāhi jihīrṣāmy āśramād imām

text.ascii: manyur hi hRdayaM me 'dya pradahann iva tiSThati
text.ur: manyur hi hr̥dayaṁ me ’dya pradahann iva tiṣṭhati

text.ascii: matpUrvabhAryAM yad imAM bhRguH prApa sumadhyamAm
text.ur: matpūrvabhāryāṁ yad imāṁ bhr̥guḥ prāpa sumadhyamām

text.ascii: tad rakSa evam Amantrya jvalitaM jAtavedasam
text.ur: tad rakṣa evam āmantrya jvalitaṁ jātavedasam

text.ascii: zaGkamAno bhRgor bhAryAM punaH punar apRcchata
text.ur: śaṅkamāno bhr̥gor bhāryāṁ punaḥ punar apr̥cchata

text.ascii: tvam agne sarvabhUtAnAm antaz carasi nityadA
text.ur: tvam agne sarvabhūtānām antaś carasi nityadā

text.ascii: sAkSivat puNyapApeSu satyaM brUhi kave vacaH
text.ur: sākṣivat puṇyapāpeṣu satyaṁ brūhi kave vacaḥ

text.ascii: matpUrvabhAryApahRtA bhRguNAnRtakAriNA
text.ur: matpūrvabhāryāpahr̥tā bhr̥guṇānr̥takāriṇā

text.ascii: seyaM yadi tathA me tvaM satyam AkhyAtum arhasi
text.ud: सेयं यदि तथा मे त्वं सत्यमाख्यातुमर्हसि
text.ur: seyaṁ yadi tathā me tvaṁ satyam ākhyātum arhasi

text.ascii: zrutvA tvatto bhRgor bhAryAM hariSyAmy aham AzramAt
text.ur: śrutvā tvatto bhr̥gor bhāryāṁ hariṣyāmy aham āśramāt

text.ascii: jAtavedaH pazyatas te vada satyAM giraM mama
text.ud: जातवेदः पश्यतस्ते वद सत्यां गिरं मम
text.ur: jātavedaḥ paśyatas te vada satyāṁ giraṁ mama

text.ascii: tasya tad vacanaM zrutvA saptArcir duHkhito bhRzam
text.ur: tasya tad vacanaṁ śrutvā saptārcir duḥkhito bhr̥śam

text.ascii: bhIto 'nRtAc ca zApAc ca bhRgor ity abravIc chanaiH
text.ur: bhīto ’nr̥tāc ca śāpāc ca bhr̥gor ity abravīc chanaiḥ
